Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律か……
Entry.EnglishText: Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……戒律のせいで しゃべれないんだったネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right... Can't speak because of the commandments.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、男とは 話せないようだな……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that you can't talk to men because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律……ですね。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, the Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか、戒律が あったんだったな……
Entry.EnglishText: Man... So we really can't talk because of the Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、女と 話せないんだったわね……
Entry.EnglishText: Because of the commandments, you aren't allowed to talk to women....

Entry.JapaneseText: 売りたそうにしているが、 戒律のせいで、異性とは 話ができないようだ。
Entry.EnglishText: He looks like he wants to sell, but because of the commandments, he can't seem to talk to the opposite sex.

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd

Entry.JapaneseText: 装備品屋・道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Weapon Shop - Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: オックス
Entry.EnglishText: Ox

Entry.JapaneseText: 皆さん……一体、世の中は どうなってしまったんでしょう……
Entry.EnglishText: What on earth has happened to this world...?

Entry.JapaneseText: この街の多くの人も、 よそから来る人も、 種族が違うと言うだけで、 互いに憎み合っています……
Entry.EnglishText: Fellow villagers and outsiders have been saying things about the other race and hating each other...

Entry.JapaneseText: 僕もダナも……ますます……
Entry.EnglishText: Even Dana and I are...

Entry.JapaneseText: 皆さんのおかげで、無事に ダナと再会できました……
Entry.EnglishText: I was able to reunite with Dana again thanks to you guys...

Entry.JapaneseText: 僕たち……考えてみます。 この街で、二人で生きるために 何をすべきなのかを……
Entry.EnglishText: We've been thinking... About what we need to do in order to live here...

Entry.JapaneseText: ダナ……ダナが心配です。 でも、どうしたらいいのか……
Entry.EnglishText: I-I'm worried about Dana. But I don't know what to do...

Entry.JapaneseText: 僕とダナは種族は違いますが、 気持ちはひとつです……
Entry.EnglishText: I might not share the same race as Dana, but our feelings are one...

Entry.JapaneseText: 街の人たちが、僕たちのように お互いを認め合えるなら…… きっと、いつかは……
Entry.EnglishText: If the townspeople would just accept both of us, then... I'm sure someday...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか不安にさせる音ですね。 何も起こらなければいいのですが……
Entry.EnglishText: This sound is making me uneasy... I hope nothing bad will happen...

Entry.JapaneseText: 今こそ、同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>としてみんなが まとまらなくてはいけない時です。
Entry.EnglishText: Now's the time for everyone to acknowledge that we are all the same <Yellow>people<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 僕とダナは……この街で 生きる事にしました。
Entry.EnglishText: Dana and I... We've both decided to live here...

Entry.JapaneseText: 僕たちなら、街のみんなに 大切な何かを伝えられるような 気がするんです……！
Entry.EnglishText: I have a feeling that we can convey something important to everyone!

Entry.JapaneseText: 男女が話をしてはいけないという 戒律を破ったうえに…… ガジュマのダナを……
Entry.EnglishText: Not only should man and woman converse, on top of that, Dana's a Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 僕たちは許されざる者、 なんでしょうか？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if they'd allow such a thing...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1c000061>何も覚えてないって よくわかったな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1C000061>Good call you made about that guy not remembering things.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1c000062>以前、ワルトゥの暗示に かかった人たちを元に戻した時も、 操られていた間の記憶が なかったからな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1C000062>Yeah, it's because I remembered that Walto's targets don't remember anything from when they were being controlled.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1c000063>この家の旦那は、 祭司の言葉で暗示を 解かれたようね。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1C000063>That man was released from Walto's control due to a word from the priest, correct?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1c000064>フォルスの暗示を解くために ワルトゥが用意した協力者は 祭司だったというわけだな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1C000064>Then that priest must be Walto's accomplice in releasing the controlled townspeople once they're no longer of use.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1c000065>暗示を解くカギは 音ではなくて 言葉だったみたいですね。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1C000065>It seems as though the catalyst is not a sound, but rather a word.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1c000066>じゃ、その祭司さんのところに、 リフトを動かすナゾナゾの 答を聞きに行こう！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1C000066>Then let's find the priest and solve this puzzle once and for all to get that lift moving!

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3404>が仲間になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3404> joined the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3410>が同行します。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3410> is now travelling with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice
